channel.title: KingPK server
channel.description:
I posted in another thread a week or two ago about starting up KingPk and developing it. Even since then a buddy and I have been working on it and trying to get things straightened up.
The server is getting there. I will need about 10 testers to beta test the server this weekend. If anyone is interested please contact me in a pm and we can get account set up. Beta testers will have access to the game and will have to report to myself or one of the devs about bugs, concerns, improvements, etc.. So please be willing to provide us with some feedback, positive and/or negative.
We have been working hard trying to fix and tune up the old kingpk. Though it is not complete yet, we will continue to develop it, add custom features, etc..
If anyone has any questions or concerns feel free to PM me.
Thanks for the patience for the people who have been waiting.
Also, we are looking for 1-2 more developers. Please PM me with your experience in rsc server development, languages(code), and if you can provide and evidence of past or current projects.

item.description:
@stee wrote:

[quote=“Stealmojo, post:168, topic:514198”][quote author=waj link=topic=632448.msg4346658#msg4346658 date=1375979126]
Tbh, the KingPK source is absolute shit.

I mean has anyone with a decent bit of experience checked the thing out? Its one of the worse sources I’ve came across, even easyRSC is better.

Anyway I suggest porting it over to MoparClassic/DarkQuest, after all it could all be ported over within the hour.
[/quote]
Tr0llmuch has messaged me and said that this servers’ ETA is sometime today, he hasn’t promised, but by the way he sent it sounds like it’s soon![/quote]

Oh the joys of living in England!

item.title: KingPK server
item.dc:creator: @stee stee
item.description:
@stee wrote:

[quote=“Stealmojo, post:165, topic:514198”][quote author=Jauro link=topic=632448.msg4346615#msg4346615 date=1375975038]

I offically have someone working on my web files. the time is now in his hands, However I do promise KingPk will be re hosted with all of its glory soon. The web files has caused a delay but once its fixed and secure it will be a much needed delay!

Stop teasing!

haha unless you have played kingpk before its nothing crazy to be to excited about… unles that is you love fast xp and quicker time to get in the wild PKING!

Everything is 99% now. I will make an actual topic letting everyone know when its ready to rock n roll

Yeah man, played the original before. One of the better servers imo

I miss it, but I also miss “StorkPK” <-- The original, Swaggerpk… Etc… KingPK was for sure one of my most favorite.
[/quote]
Original stork was good ye, but all the replicas failed, SwagPk by Joe was good one too, not swagger haha. and ye KingPk was a simple but epic server[/quote]
I think the first ever RSC server I played was Peekay, with the Glowing daggers etc… Cleaning people left and right.
[/quote]

Hahaha I remember peekay! There’e been some proper shit servers tho.

Read full topic

item.title: KingPK server
item.dc:creator: @Stealmojo Stealmojo
item.description:
@Stealmojo wrote:

[quote=“Tr0llmuch, post:151, topic:514198”][quote author=Stealmojo link=topic=632448.msg4346039#msg4346039 date=1375895614]

Jesus, can it be true?

Is KingPK coming back?

I tip my hat to you sir.

There’s still no one willing to run this, so…

I am the one who ran it to start with, so ill be the one to host it, However as i mentioned thats all I will be doing is hosting it. I will still need more people to message me who are willing to help mantain it and manage it.

I should have something online in the next 48ish hours.

fudge yes, you sir are sexy.

Please, (other sexy people) help him out… I’m tired of RSCE, haven’t touched it in the past 6 months… All I want is a f2p server again.

Seeing as there were no other RSC servers, it resulted into me turning to Rs2, Oldschool, WoW, League of Legends, Day Z, and last, but not least, RushPK, or something.

Can’t wait.

A lot of people who play these games also enjoy dofus you ever tried it?.. its what i play and diablo2,LoL,oldschool.

I will certainly check that out sometime, but I just started oldschool… Just bought 2 memberships, 10m cash, tribot VIP, botting my life out and my twin brothers.

OT: Yes, certain people get a little butthurt when money loss happens.
I can’t wait Troll, and I still didn’t quite understand, did you say… SPAWN? :\ If it’s only the starter items, that’s fine, but please no ::item :s - The experience rate was also fine.
Thanks for even trying to bring it up - Please someone help him!
[/quote]

No one can spawn tiems. I am only awaiting now proper web files. Once those are obtained we will be live.

p/s offical 2007 osr owns tbh[/quote]

Highly agreed.

@Dustin, are you serious?

Read full topic
